mapper.select: SELECT A.CLAIM_NO, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_ID, A.CUSTOMER_NAME, A.CUST_EMP_NO, A.CUST_TEL, A.LAST_USER_ID, A.LAST_USER, A.CREATE_EMP_NO, A.LAST_USER_TEL, A.CONTRACT_VOLUME, A.OBJECTION_NUM, A.BATTEN_PLATE_NO, A.ORIGINAL_CAR_NO, A.LAST_USER_ADDR, A.CONTRACT_NO, B.LOGISTICS_PROCESS, B.END_PROCESSING_TECH, B.DEFECT_NAME, B.PRODUCT_DT, B.SHIFT, B.INQUIRE_INFO, B.FIELD_CONCLUSION, B.USER_REQUIREMENT, B.HANDING_SUGGESTION, B.INQUIRE_STATE, B.FOLLOW_REASON, B.REJECT_REASON, B.AMOUNT_OF_USE FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE B ON A.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO WHERE A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE (SID, CLAIM_NO, LOGISTICS_PROCESS, END_PROCESSING_TECH, DEFECT_NAME, PRODUCT_DT, SHIFT, FIELD_CONCLUSION, USER_REQUIREMENT, HANDING_SUGGESTION, INQUIRE_STATE, FOLLOW_REASON, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DT, VERSION, INQUIRE_INFO ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{inquireInfo,jdbcType=CLOB} )

SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE
SID,
CLAIM_NO,
LOGISTICS_PROCESS,
END_PROCESSING_TECH,
DEFECT_NAME,
PRODUCT_DT,
SHIFT,
FIELD_CONCLUSION,
USER_REQUIREMENT,
HANDING_SUGGESTION,
INQUIRE_STATE,
FOLLOW_REASON,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DT,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DT,
VERSION,
INQUIRE_INFO,
#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{defectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{followReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{inquireInfo,jdbcType=CLOB},
mapper.update:
update CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE
set version = version + 1,
LOGISTICS_PROCESS = #{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT_OF_USE = #{amountOfUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
END_PROCESSING_TECH = #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFECT_NAME = #{defectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DT = #{productDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_INFO = #{inquireInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CONCLUSION = #{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_REQUIREMENT = #{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDING_SUGGESTION = #{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
